text:
@realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews Who wrote the questions? Your campaign manager @parscale? Or have you already replaced him with Hannity? 

Why are you anti-democracy?

Why are you promoting the Confederacy?

Why do you think #COVID19 is about you?
